blog.name: tjm-studiomejragon-design
blog.description: sketch dump of Tolliver J Mortaelwyver

title: Daily Doodles: The Pikaroots
body:
In putting my new computer to the test, I went straight to my Pika-roots for comfort, and now I am onto the idea of drawing poke’mon and digimon again like I did in my early days of drawing for the sake of putting this machine to the test.

I love poke’mon and Pikachu especially because drawing him inspired me to really begin creating and drawing my own stuff and ideas.

Fun fact: My first ever idea for a poke’mon fanfic was a detective agency run by a Pikachu and a Meowth (who later became Shystor, the Catmon/Khatmon when digimon took precidence over the poke’world). So…a detective Pikachu game AND movie both highly amuse me. XD I feel like a clairvoyant who predicted it all the way back in ‘99.

Anyway, here’s the daily sketch, Sherlock Chu.

reblog.comment:

So…a detective Pikachu game AND movie both highly amuse me. XD I feel like a clairvoyant who predicted it all the way back in ‘99.

Anyway, here’s the daily sketch, Sherlock Chu.

Anyway, here’s the daily sketch, Sherlock Chu.

So…a detective Pikachu game AND movie both highly amuse me. XD I feel like a clairvoyant who predicted it all the way back in ‘99.

Anyway, here’s the daily sketch, Sherlock Chu.

tags: the world building surprisingly makes a lot of sense
ryme city really is the perfect place
for a detective slash buddy cop slash noir film
summary: For all of Ryme City’s talk of being a ‘celebration of the harmony between humans and Pokemon’, it’s almost impossible for any...
body:
For all of Ryme City’s talk of being a ‘celebration of the harmony between humans and Pokemon’, it’s almost impossible for any random Joe there to get into casual Pokemon training and battling (and from there professional), especially compared to the rest of the world…

…because the place is friggin’ cramped.

You can’t just look at someone in the eyes and declare battle in Ryme City when there are practically no open spaces. Way too easy for a stray attack to hit someone or something.

It’s against the law to battle in open public. There are probably stadiums and other places where sanctioned battles can take place, but there aren’t that many of them and bookings are tight. This unfortunately means that underground, illegal battles are a popular thing and from there more related crimes flourish.

Another thing is that since legal battling is restricted, your average citizen has weak Pokemon. As the most reliable way to get stronger is to be part of the illegal battling scene, criminals logically have better Pokemon and would have little trouble exerting their force over civilians.

reblog.comment:

tags: the guy is sleeping but you have to take a minute and look at him to realize it
summary: I think what we have failed to understand is that the disturbing thing about Jigglypuff is not the hair and the freakish...
body:
I think what we have failed to understand is that the disturbing thing about Jigglypuff is not the hair and the freakish realism,

It’s the fact that it really looks like jigglypuff just killed a man in a night club

blog.name: animatetheworldcast
blog.title: ATW!
blog.description:
Animate the World! is a conversational podcast that airs every other week!

----

Join our hosts Richard and Kelly as they discuss, comment and dissect anything and everything pertaining to animation.

----

We track the #atwcast tag on tumblr

summary: ATW! 61: The Ethics of Giving Pikachu a Gun I now pronounce you husbando and waifu! At least, I WOULD if VR would get its shit...
track_name: ATW! 61: The Ethics of Giving Pikachu a Gun
caption:
ATW! 61: The Ethics of Giving Pikachu a Gun

I now pronounce you husbando and waifu! At least, I WOULD if VR would get its shit together. Anyway, we talk about marrying our fave characters in VR, and Richard gets a little too into it! Then we talk about the recent enigma that is Detective Pikachu. Where did it come from? Where will it go? Let’s go, Pikachu!
Music: TheFatRat – Prelude
Rec: There’s a Rang-Tan in My Bedroom

~☆ subscribe to us on Itunes and gives us five stars ☆~
